WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing for Failure to meet the Posting Guidelines:1) You must speak your issue clearly2) You must attach a character file where the issue can be seen3) You must provide steps to reproduce the issue
WorkItem.Description:
Hi, with 2.3.1, rawr gave me wrong item score, which cost me a few bucks.
Updating to 2.3.2, the item thing seemed to be fixed. But the enchants are wrong again.
For example, as a dps dk, I am using Arcanum of Torment for head. Well, rawr told me that Arcanum of Ferocity was the best for me. How could that be possible?
Checking out all enchants of my items, seems like everyone is wrong.
WorkItem.Summary: I think something (enchants) is very wrong with 2.3.2.

Comments.Message:
One of the devs will probably ask you for your character .xml.  Otherwise, they can't do much to help you identify the problem.
On another note, I had a similar issue with both dpsdk and enhance modules.  The issue resolved itself when I reloaded my character/s from the armoury and saved to a new .xml.  I suggest trying that.

The main difference between those 2 enchants is that the Arcanum of Ferocity has +hit on it.   If you are in bad need of +Hit and it is worth more than the +Crit on the Arcanum of Torment, then it may well be a bigger upgrade for you.
Yeah, pretty much, we need you to follow the posting and bug reporting guidelines, if you want us to help you. http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=PostingGuidelines&referringTitle=Documentation
